"Been enjoying Gathering?": "Outside the City, there's a wealth of vegetables, fruits, Ores and Tames meat to be harvested."
"Those fresh ingredients and strong materials are sure to benefit you in your battles to come."
"Oh, and don't forget, you can always check the World Map to remind yourself where to find certain Ores."
"So far, you've gone to Central, Northern, and Southern Aelio to find Ores."
"Finally, let's teach you about the Ores of Western Aelio."
"In Western Aelio, both Dualomite and Trinite can be Gathered."
"We've already talked about these two Ores before, so you should be able to remember what to look for, aye?"
"Same deal as usual. Get out there and try finding some quarry. Hah-hah-hah!"
"Well, whenever you'd like to learn about Ores, just let me know."
